dc_title_s: New York state boundary with offshore boundaries
dc_description_s: New York state boundary includes offshore boundaries (oceans, bays, and great lakes). This map layer portrays the State boundaries of the United States, and the boundaries of Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. The map layer was created by extracting the State boundary polygons from the individual 1:2,000,000-scale State boundary Digital Line Graph (DLG) files produced by the U.S.
